RippleMatch | Senior Software Engineer | NYC | Onsite, Full-time

At RippleMatch, we help entry-level candidates find their dream jobs. Figuring out where to begin a career is a huge decision, but students are often forced to rely on overstretched career services centers and personal connections when they begin their job search. We have built the first product ever to automate early career recruiting and career coaching. Our software handles all the heavy lifting that has traditionally gone into recruiting for companies and helps candidates find the right opportunities.

Since launching RippleMatch from our college dorm room, we have taken off on college campuses, raised around $5 million in venture funding, and brought on some of the most exciting companies in the country as customers.

Stack: Vue.js / Python / Postgres / AWS
